fields.name: __Mining__
fields.value:
Select the :pick: emoji in [#üìå‚îÇget-roles](https://discord.com/channels/668903786361651200/844874658561130506) to access the mining channels
[__..__](https://ergonaut.space/en/Guides/Mining)

fields.name: __‚ù§Ô∏è Contributing__
fields.value: See the [contributing](https://ergonaut.space/en/Ergo/Contributing) page for information on how to get involved (or for any logos/images)

fields.name: __üé©Tip Bot__
fields.value: Tips across discord, telegram, reddit, and twitter with ergo native tokens. Full setup guide available on [ergonaut.space](https://ergonaut.space/en/Guides/tip-bot)

fields.name: __üí∞Grants and Bounties__
fields.value: Check out the [#üí∞jobs-bounties](https://discord.com/channels/668903786361651200/880827367868743730) channel, or the [grow-ergo](https://github.com/ergoplatform/grow-ergo) repository. But in general, anything that adds value to the ecosystem is subject to a bounty. The quickest way to get funding is to start a [Raffle](https://ergoraffle.com/) which can be topped up by the Ergo Foundation, Whale grants, or anyone in the community.

title: Welcome to Ergo
description:
**Powering the future of finance.** 
Ergo is a next-generation smart contract platform that enables anyone to participate in the digital DeFi revolution, now. 

see [sigmaverse.io](https://sigmaverse.io) to see applications built on Ergo.
